description.displayText:
We engaged Brittanie to look after our 8 month old baby for two months while visiting New York from Australia.  Brittanie was outstanding in her care of him and even though we had previously never left him with anyone who wasn't family, we instantly felt at ease with Brittanie.  

She is honest, caring and affectionate with our baby, very capable in terms of administering proper care for a baby who was teething and then experiencing a bad cold.  

The other great thing about Brittanie is that she is very easy to deal with.  She is a very good communicator as well as being punctual and proactive.

If you are fortunate enough to have Brittanie care for your children, I am sure you will be very happy with the experience.

description.displayText: I had a very pleasant interview with Brittanie C.  She communicates well via email and texting.  I hope to utilize her services in the future because I feel I can trust her with my daughter!
